short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to generate cover letters and cold mails using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to generate AI cover letters and cold emails in by uploading your resume. We use automated techniques to collect data from your Linkedin job page and combine it with your resume to provide you the best results
